title: PROOF! The Tribunal Works
body:
This is just to show anyone who has been frustrated in their games feeling like nothing is being done about League toxicity. 

I just played a game with an abusive Jinx and I got this message 3 minutes after the game had ended. This really boosts my spirits again after feeling like I get nothing but situations.

Also Poppy rework looks great!

Thanks Rito! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
It is the best feeling to get one of those (and it was only my friend that got it) But I'd like to correct a few misconceptions. It actually has nothing to with the Tribunal. The tribunal is in a rework at the moment and isn't active in any regions, this is a result of the beast of a instant feedback system which is basically an automated system that looks at a whole bunch of things to determine punishments (or lack thereof). This is just proof it's doing its job :)

I should also note that only those who reported the player in the last game (the one that triggers the punishment) receive a notification, which is why so few people actually see these.

Congratulations on getting one more deserving player punished!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Just because people get punished, doesn't mean it works.
I have had this notification once in 2 years playing League. Riot should probably try and let people know if their reports did anything more often.
